title: Equilar 100: The Highest-Paid CEOs at the Largest U.S. Companies
title2: Pay Trends Before the COVID-19 Pandemic
description: The annual Equilar 100 study examines CEO compensation at the largest companies by revenue that filed an annual proxy statement before March 31.

title: Executive Long-Term Incentive Plans
description: Executive Long-Term Incentive Plans, an Equilar publication, examines trends in incentive plan design at Equilar 500 companies over the last five fiscal years. The report analyzes performance metrics and periods associated with long-term awards granted to NEOs, particularly CEOs and CFOs. E*TRADE Corporate Services provided independent commentary on the structure of incentive plan design, particularly in light of the current environment.
